query.title: Resource on the basis of parent id
query.content: SELECT ID, RESOURCE_MASTER_ID,MODULE_ID, RESOURCE_ID, MENU_ID, PARENT_ACTION_ID, RESOURCE_NAME, RESOURCE_URL, RESOURCE_MASTER_PARENT_ID FROM ref_mst_hierarchy_resource where RESOURCE_TYPE= 'breadcrumb' AND RESOURCE_MASTER_PARENT_ID=':pid' ORDER BY ID

query.title: Resource on the basis of id
query.content: SELECT ID, RESOURCE_MASTER_ID, RESOURCE_NAME, RESOURCE_URL, RESOURCE_MASTER_PARENT_ID FROM ref_mst_hierarchy_resource WHERE RESOURCE_TYPE= 'breadcrumb' AND RESOURCE_MASTER_ID=':id' ORDER BY ID

query.title: Get all master ids
query.content: SELECT MAX(ID) AS MAX_ID FROM ref_mst_hierarchy_resource

query.title: Get Resource Master Id of a ID
query.content: SELECT RESOURCE_MASTER_ID FROM ref_mst_hierarchy_resource WHERE ID = :id
